about_the_game:
A house on a grassy plain. A tree on a hill. A sky full of stars. Important things are remembered in the form of snapshots in your brain.
"Even after you're gone, you're still here with me."

Melon is an emotional role-playing puzzle adventure game about piecing together memories of a puppy with its owner in the search of their lost story. Unlock chapters in a linear fashion that will each reveal a different but special moment~

Key Features

  • Emotional virtual journey: Immerse in the little moments with Melon. Each level gradually reveals a unique time period and a unique story,
  • Jigsaw features: Melon features 11 unique jigsaw puzzles. Each puzzle is equipped with automatic saving, automatic shuffling, and hints system to assist you in the journey.
  • A relaxing experience: Relax with slow-paced piano soundtrack and rainy atmospherical background for a stress-relieving experience.
